parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description:
The client token that is used to ensure the idempotence of the request.

You can use the client to generate the token, but you must make sure that the token is unique among all requests. The token can contain only ASCII characters.

>  If you do not specify this parameter, the system automatically uses the **request ID** as the **client token**. The **request ID** is different for each request.

parameters.name: Description
parameters.description:
The description of the IP address pool.

The description must be 0 to 256 characters in length and cannot start with `http://` or `https://`.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the contiguous EIP group to be migrated.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description:
The name of the IP address pool.

The name must be 0 to 128 characters in length and cannot start with `http://` or `https://`.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the region to which the contiguous EIP group belongs. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~36063~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group to which the address pool belongs.
